resources.string: "MTK Non-Framework LBS is a group of native services that including following functions: 1. AGPS SET Initiated location requests through SUPL server. 2. Network initiated location requests through carrier network. 3. Network initiated location requests through SUPL server. 4. Network initiated location requests through C2K network. 5. VoWiFi location requests for registration. 6. Modem/AP location requests for EM debug. 7. Improve telecom network camp time. 8. etc."
To allow this service to access your device location, enable location permission at the Allow all the time level.
